body_html:
Some things of note:

  • Documentation has been updated in the next release so this choice will be clearer and one doesn't have to read through the code
  • This is in contrib, as layers make their way to the fully supported public API (tf.layers), many of these choices are being revisited and documentation updated.

FYI @sguada @nathansilberman @martinwicke in case they have anything to add.
Thanks!
body_text:
Some things of note:

Documentation has been updated in the next release so this choice will be clearer and one doesn't have to read through the code
This is in contrib, as layers make their way to the fully supported public API (tf.layers), many of these choices are being revisited and documentation updated.

body:
Some things of note:

- [Documentation has been updated in the next release](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.1/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/layers/fully_connected) so this choice will be clearer and one doesn't have to read through the code
- This is in `contrib`, as layers make their way to the fully supported public API ([`tf.layers`](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/layers)), many of these choices are being revisited and documentation updated.

FYI @sguada @nathansilberman @martinwicke in case they have anything to add.
Thanks!
